strings.basecampEruEmergencyListItemOne: Can accommodate 2-10 RC delegates, and can be scaled by 2 delegates at the time.
strings.basecampEruEmergencyListItemTwo: Kitchen facilities are very limited, mostly dry bag food.
strings.basecampEruEmergencyListItemThree: Office facilities for up to 8 delegates.
strings.basecampEruEmergencyListItemFour: Filtration water treatment (CW200) of up to 1,200 liter per day.
strings.basecampEruEmergencyListItemSix: Portable solar power system (40-50 Ah battery/75W panels).
strings.designedForDetailsSectionTwo: Assessment teams or small short term operations.
strings.basecampEruComponentListItemEight: Dry food for 10 persons for 7 days
